thread.title: QuWave Investigates Products Using Kirlian Photography
thread.title_full: QuWave Investigates Products Using Kirlian Photography

author: prbuzz.com
title: QuWave Investigates Products Using Kirlian Photography
text:
Ledgewood, NJ (PR Buzz) September 2, 2015--- QuWave has tested its products using Kirlian Photography ('aura photography') and attained visible results.
Using the QuWave Energizer and the QuWave Harmonizer the company has produced visible imagery of the aura of plants and humans. The company conducted nine experiments: four on leaves, two on raisins, and three on humans. The images are visible here: http://quwave.com/QuWave-Test-Resuls-from-Kirlian-Photography-Experiments.html
Each of the experiments tested the organic matter before being used on the Energizer or Harmonizer and after being used on the Energizer or Harmonizer. In each of the experiments the aura is brighter and more distinct after being put under the influence of one of the QuWave products.
Kirlian Photography was discovered in 1939 by Russian electrical engineer and inventor Semyon Kirlian. Although it was discovered in the 1930's it did not gain widespread recognition until the early 1960's. George Harrison (a member of the Beatles) used an image from Kirlian Photography on his 1973 album Living in the Material World.
The Kirlian Image is purported to be a physical manifestation of the spiritual aura. It is designed to reveal the bioelectrical charge of an organism. Some theorize it shows orgone or chi energy.
The QuWave Energizer and QuWave Harmonizer are two of QuWave's most popular products. The Energizer is designed to energize food, water, or jewelry with orgone chi energy. The Harmonizer is designed to protect against the harmful effects of electromagnetic fields and improve quality of life.
About QuWave:
QuWave LLC, a prominent organization in the energy medicine field, manufacturing unique and active products that block the negative effects of EMF pollution and radiation while also generating Scalar Waves, Solfeggio Frequencies, Schumann Resonance, and Chi Orgone energies to promote a healthy, balanced lifestyle. QuWave is an online company located in Ledgewood, NJ that has customers, affiliates, and resellers around the world. For more information on QuWave, visit www.QuWave.com
